text: Janis Lynn Hape (March 10, 1958 â€“ March 7, 2021), also known by her married name Janis Dowd, was an American competition swimmer. Hape represented the United States as an 18-year-old at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, Quebec.Sports-Reference.com, Olympic Sports, Athletes, Janis Hape . Retrieved October 27, 2012. She was born in Gary, Indiana. Hape died from heart failure in Charlotte, North Carolina on March 7, 2021 at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American swimmers Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Sportspeople from Gary, Indiana
title: Janis Hape
